title: ISA Black Wool Blouse
meta_description: Experience the luxury of our ultra-fine wool fabric. This exceptionally thin wool is crafted to be nearly transparent, offering a delicate and airy feel while maintaining excellent warmth.
description:
Experience the luxury of our ultra-fine wool fabric. This exceptionally thin wool is crafted to be nearly transparent, offering a delicate and airy feel while maintaining excellent warmth. Perfect for layering, it provides a cozy yet lightweight option for cooler days. The fabric's natural breathability ensures comfort, making it ideal for both casual and elegant outfits. Whether used in scarves, shawls, or light sweaters, this wool combines sophistication with practical warmth.  Knitted blouse, each size fits 2 up to 46-48, wide round neckline, extra-long sleeves and cuffs.

title: ISA Textured White Blouse
meta_description: luxurious Italian textured wool, sophistication, practical warmth—perfect, winter season, casual charm, elegance.
description:
We believe fashion should embrace both elegance and purpose. The Isa Blouse, crafted from luxurious textured Italian wool, is designed to offer effortless sophistication with practical warmth—perfect for the winter season. Featuring a wide round neckline, extra-long sleeves with elegant cuffs, and the signature Isa silhouette, it embodies timeless style with a modern edge. Whether paired with tailored trousers or your favorite jeans, this versatile piece elevates your look while reflecting your commitment to conscious, refined fashion—because true style is about more than what you wear, it’s about why you wear it.

title: Sporty Chic Trousers
meta_description: Elevate your wardrobe with our classic tailored trousers. These trousers are designed with a timeless silhouette that flatters every figure. Crafted from high-quality fabric, they offer a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication. The mid-rise waist and straight-leg cut provide a sleek and polished look, ideal for both professional and casual settings.
description:
Elevate your wardrobe with our classic tailored trousers. These trousers are designed with a timeless silhouette that flatters every figure. Crafted from high-quality fabric, they offer a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication. The mid-rise waist and straight-leg cut provide a sleek and polished look, ideal for both professional and casual settings. Features include side pockets, and a discreet side zip closure and button, ensuring a refined finish. Pair them with a (Isa) blouse for the office or a chic top for an evening out.

title: Waterproof Libero backpack
meta_description: Compact and reliable, our little waterproof backpack is your perfect companion for any adventure. Made from durable, water-resistant nylon, even if still very light, its capacity keeps your essentials dry and protected, no matter the weather.
description:
Compact and reliable, our little waterproof backpack is your perfect companion for any adventure. Made from durable, water-resistant nylon, even if still very light, its capacity keeps your essentials dry and protected, no matter the weather. Lined with 100% army cotton, a spacious main compartment, secure zippered pockets inside and outside, Adjustable straps for a comfortable fit. Ideal for everything, trips, hikes, or daily commutes, this backpack combines practicality with style, ensuring you stay organized and prepared on the go.
